title: What happens when your bank isn't really a bank and your money disappears?
description: The long-standing promise of bank insurance faces a crisis as online-only lenders with millions in deposits face turmoil, freezing customer accounts and leaving many in the dark about their money's fate. The complex web of blame, bankruptcy, and missing funds has left depositors struggling to recoup their life savings.
